mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfAffOrdPrcs Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ AFF_ORD_SN , AFF_ORD_TURN , AFF_COM_ID , AFF_COM_NM , AFF_ORD_DT , AFF_ORD_CNFIRM_PRCS_YN , AFF_ORD_PRCS_CNFIRM_DT , AFF_ORD_SHTG_YN , AFF_ORD_SHTG_PRCS_DT , DLV_INFO_DLIV_YN , DLV_INFO_DLIV_DT , DLV_COM_CD , DMSTC_WAYBIL_NO , AFF_COM_DLV_NO , AFF_COM_DLV_TURN , DLIVY_COMPT_YN , DLIVY_COMPT_PRCS_DT , RTRVL_CNFIRM_PRCS_YN , RTRVL_CNFIRM_PRCS_DT , RETRN_CD , RETRN_CONT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_AFF_ORD_PRCS WHERE 1 = 1 AND AFF_ORD_SN = #{affOrdSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND AFF_ORD_TURN = #{affOrdTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
